generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: License, notices and acknowledgment in documentation
obligations.verbatim: In addition publicly documented acknowledgment must be given that this software has been used if no source code of this software is made available publicly. This includes acknowledgments in either Copyright notices, Manuals, Publicity and Marketing documents or any documentation provided with any product containing this software.

generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve License and notices in source code
obligations.verbatim: T he above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies of the Software and its Copyright notices.
